prompts: Create a charming bird Pokemon that loves to sing and dance in the forest.
Imagine a small, colorful Pokemon that flits around flowers, spreading joy.
Design a playful flying-type Pokemon with bright orange and blue feathers.
Generate a tiny Pokemon that is always in motion, chasing after insects.

Make a cute bird Pokemon with distinct tail feathers and a friendly demeanor.
Give me a delightful Pokemon that brings warmth and happiness wherever it goes.
